backend/main.mo: Main actor defining hotel, room, booking, payment, and user data types with storage maps and initial state setup including hardcoded admin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor types and a no-op run function returning the old state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH color theme with light/dark mode variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, root div, and loading the app script.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Pre‑deployment regression checklist covering auth, booking flows, hotel management, payments, and UI error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, React Query client, auth/role guards, and application routes wrapped in AppShell.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version constant v32.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Displays a bookings overview table for admins, handling loading, error, and empty states while showing booking details and hotel names.
frontend/src/components/admin/DataCleanu: Provides admin tools to remove legacy room photos and payment methods for specific hotels, showing results and validation feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Allows admins to toggle hotel active status and subscription types, showing a table of hotels with update controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Manages creation and listing of invite tokens bound to hotel principals, including validation, token generation, and copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access-denied page showing required roles, navigation options, and optionally a hotel activation form when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Shows an error screen when permission checks fail, providing retry and navigation options along with the error message.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: UI form for validating and consuming hotel invite tokens, triggering account activation and refetching related queries.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Gate that prompts authenticated users without a profile to complete basic info before accessing children content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks access until the user is authenticated via Internet Identity, showing a login prompt if not.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based access guard that checks user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog showing detailed booking information including dates, guests, rooms, pricing, and optional guest principal.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating hotel bookings with date validation, price calculation, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Badge component that displays a booking status with corresponding label and visual variant.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Displays the user's bookings with hotel names, status badges, cancel flow, and detailed views, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Shows a modal dialog that previews an image with a close button and optional title.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Provides real‑time authentication and role diagnostics using various auth queries and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Lets hotels view, confirm, and cancel bookings for their property, with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Allows hotels to add and remove payment methods, with a form UI and toast‑based feedback.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Enables editing of a hotel’s profile details such as name, location, contact info, and map link.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Placeholder panel indicating stay‑recording functionality is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with fallback handling, error tracking, and compact or full layouts including thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Provides UI to create and edit hotel rooms, including image uploads, form validation, and integration with backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows hotel subscription status with badges and messages, and displays admin contact instructions when inactive.
Defines the main app layout with top navigation, content area, and footer showing build version.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a language dropdown allowing the user to switch the app locale.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar showing links, login/logout, and conditional admin or hotel area access based on user status.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact and payment options specifically for hotel activation or subscription management.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and contact options, rendering cards for each method and buttons for WhatsApp or email if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state and actions, loading stored identities and handling login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend user, role, hotel, booking, and invite-token data using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles image uploads for rooms by converting files to data URLs while tracking upload progress and state.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Stores and provides the app's locale setting, persisting it to localStorage and exposing a setter via context.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and base styling for the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Handles user account status, invite token validation/consumption, role checks, and refresh actions for identity and hotel activation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Displays admin panels for invite tokens, hotel visibility, bookings, and data cleanup.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Lists all hotels with thumbnails, handles image previews and errors, and links to hotel details.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Provides guest account overview with quick navigation to bookings and account status.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Shows hotel management interface with tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed hotel info, rooms, photos, booking form, and payment methods for a selected hotel.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Landing page offering guest and hotel portals, adapting options based on user role, admin status, and hotel activation.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Renders the My Bookings page with navigation cards and displays the user's bookings table.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines extended TypeScript types and backend interface matching Motoko backend structures for hotels, rooms, bookings, and related queries.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Enables debug mode based on environment or the debug=1 URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides currency symbols, names, formatting, and validation utilities for displaying money values.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Validates, filters, and tracks room picture URLs and loading failures for display handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, backend regressions, architectural notes, and known issues impacting hotel, room, payment, and booking flows.
